changelog.md.S'il n'y a pas d'information sur la mise: If there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns updating documentation, translation or text

index.md.Tous les jours de J+1 à J+2: Every day from D+1 to D+2
index.md.Tous les mois entre J+2 après la date de: Every month between D+2 after the publication date and the 7th Olympic Games of month M
index.md.Tous les mois de J+2 à J+3 après la date: Every month from D+2 to D+3 after the publication date
index.md.Tous les 6 mois de J+2 à J+3 après la re: Every 6 months from D+2 to D+3 after handover
index.md.Plugin permettant la récupération des do: Plugin allowing data recovery from communicating gas meters
index.md.Ce plugin est en mesure de fournir l'acc: This plugin is able to provide access to gas consumption readings as well as injection readings if applicable
index.md.Selon le type de compteur, 2 types de do: Depending on the type of meter, 2 types of data can be recovered
index.md.Il s'agit des données transmises au four: This is data transmitted to the supplier to be used for invoicing
index.md.Ces données peuvent être consultées jusq: This data can be viewed up to a maximum of 5 years ago
index.md.font référence aux données quotidiennes: refer to daily data transmitted by meters publishing monthly data for billing
index.md.Ces données peuvent être consultées jusq: This data can be consulted up to 3 years ago maximum
index.md.Toujours selon le type de compteur, les: Still depending on the type of meter, the data available is not the same, as is their frequency of availability
index.md.Tous les jours de J+1 à J+3: Every day from D+1 to D+3
index.md.Tous les mois entre le 10 et le 20 du mo: Every month between the 10th and 20th of month M
index.md.Tous les mois entre le 1er et le 6ème JO: Every month between the 1st and 6th Olympics of month M
index.md.sont pris en charge le plugin cependant: are supported plugin however they have normally all been replaced by counters
index.md.Comme tout plugin Jeedom, le plugin: Like any Jeedom plugin, the plugin
index.md.lorsqu'il apparaît durant cette opératio: when it appears during this operation because it will be useful during the Jeedom equipment configuration step
index.md.Autoriser l'accès au compte GRDF: Authorize access to the GRDF account
index.md.Pour commencer il faut autoriser le part: To begin, you must authorize the sharing of GRDF data with Jeedom by clicking on the image
index.md.vos identifiants au market Jeedom: your identifiers in the Jeedom market
index.md.Vous êtes alors redirigé vers cette page: You are then redirected to this page on which you must provide information
index.md.Connectez-vous à votre espace client GRD: Log in to your GRDF customer area
index.md.Sélectionnez vos consentements puis cliq: Select your consents then click on the button
index.md.ou 1er janvier jusqu'à 4 années en arriè: or January 1st up to 4 years ago to consult previous years in Jeedom
index.md.Au choix, la même date que celle de fin: Optionally, the same date as the end of consent for example
index.md.donner votre consentement pour un autre: give your consent for another PCE
index.md.Une fois vos consentements validés, vous: Once your consents have been validated, you have the possibility to
index.md.confirmant la fin de l'opération: confirming the end of the operation
index.md.Si vous ne parvenez pas à accéder à l'un: If you can't access one of these pages, turn off the browser's ad blocker
index.md.il faut se rendre dans le menu: you have to go to the menu
index.md.permet d'ajouter un nouveau compteur: allows you to add a new counter
index.md.le numéro d'identification du PCE: the identification number of the PCE
index.md.Une fois les autorisations d'accès valid: Once the access authorizations have been validated, all that remains is to provide
index.md.possèdent un champ de configuration comp: have an additional configuration field allowing you to choose the type of measurement to be taken
index.md.Les commandes sont crées automatiquement: Orders are created automatically based on the frequency of data collection
index.md.Le plugin se charge d'effectuer les calc: The plugin is responsible for carrying out monthly and annual calculations when necessary, which is why it is advisable to enter the start date of access to gas consumption data on January 1 during the consent stage
index.md.Lors de la 1ère sauvegarde d'un équipeme: During the first backup of active and correctly configured equipment, the plugin will automatically integrate the histories available on the GRDF customer area since the start date of access to gas consumption data
index.md.Ce processus est susceptible de durer un: This process is likely to last a long time, you can follow its progress from the menu
index.md.Les données sont récupérées à 7h du mati: Data is collected at 7 a.m. at the latest and transmitted in kilowatt-hours (`kWh`
index.md.Elles ne sont pas mises à disposition en: They are not made available in real time but are recorded at their value date in Jeedom
